notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Our minimal data set can be found in the supplementary information. The data from which they were derived are publicly available: CHIRPS data can be found at http://chg.ucsb.edu/data/chirps/ Terrestrial Ecoregions of the World data can be found at http://www.worldwildlife.org/publications/terrestrial-ecoregions-of-the-world Biodiversity Hotspots data can be found at http://www.cepf.net/resources/hotspots/Pages/default.aspx Gridded Population of the World data can be found at http://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/collection/gpw-v3 Anthromes data can be found at http://ecotope.org/anthromes/data/
